concept.philosophy: Industrial technical aesthetic. OrchestKit is infrastructure — it wires skills, agents, and hooks into circuits. The visual metaphor is a circuit board / blueprint: dark slate background with a subtle dot-grid pattern, single electric accent color (emerald), connector lines between components. Monochrome with strategic color. Feels like opening the hood of a powerful machine.
distinctive_features: Dot-grid background pattern (SVG) reminiscent of circuit board / engineering paper
Single primary accent: emerald green (#10b981) — used sparingly for maximum impact
Connector lines between hero stats (SVG paths that look like circuit traces)
Blueprint-style section headers with thin horizontal rules and monospace labels
Cards with left accent border (2px emerald) instead of full border glow
Technical 'schematic' illustrations instead of icons (SVG line drawings)
Monospace used more aggressively: stat labels, section overlines, badge text
Extremely clean grid layout with mathematical precision — no rounded corners larger than 8px
Minimal color: only emerald and white against dark slate. Red only for errors.

accent.role: Left accent borders on active items

success.note: Same as accent — emerald IS success

info.note: Muted blue-gray for info, not blue — stays monochrome

category_colors.note: In this concept, all categories share the emerald accent with varying opacity. Differentiation through position and label, not color.

secondary_palette_for_data_viz.note: Only used in interactive visualizations like charts, not in UI chrome

heading.rationale: Clean geometric pairs with blueprint aesthetic

mono.rationale: Primary differentiator. Used for section overlines, stat labels, badge text, all technical values. Much more prominent than in A or B.

spacing.note: Narrower max-width than A and B — tighter, more focused reading column. Blueprint precision.
spacing.note_card_gap: 1px gap between cards creates a 'grid of cells' look, with the border color filling the gap

hero_section.layout: Left-aligned (NOT centered). Dot-grid background. Overline in mono, title, subtitle, single CTA + install command. Stats embedded inline below as a horizontal 'circuit trace' diagram.

tailwind.content: relative z-10 mx-auto w-full max-w-[1024px] px-6 py-20
tailwind.overline: font-mono text-[11px] font-semibold uppercase tracking-[0.12em] text-[#10b981]
tailwind.title: mt-4 max-w-3xl text-4xl font-bold tracking-tight text-[#e2e8f0] sm:text-5xl lg:text-6xl
tailwind.subtitle: mt-6 max-w-lg text-[15px] text-[#94a3b8] leading-relaxed
tailwind.cta_row: mt-8 flex flex-col gap-3 sm:flex-row sm:items-center
tailwind.cta_primary: inline-flex h-10 items-center rounded-lg bg-[#10b981] px-6 text-sm font-semibold text-[#0c0f14] transition-colors hover:bg-[#34d399]
tailwind.install_command: inline-flex h-10 items-center gap-2 rounded-lg border border-[#1e293b] bg-[#111621] px-4 font-mono text-sm text-[#94a3b8]

stat_bar.layout: Horizontal strip with three values connected by thin horizontal lines (circuit traces). Monospace labels and numbers.

tailwind.trace_container: flex items-center justify-between border-t border-[#1e293b] pt-6
tailwind.stat_value: font-mono text-[40px] font-bold tabular-nums text-[#e2e8f0] leading-none
tailwind.stat_label: mt-1 font-mono text-[11px] font-medium uppercase tracking-[0.08em] text-[#64748b]
tailwind.connector_dot: absolute top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 h-1.5 w-1.5 rounded-full bg-[#10b981]

feature_card.layout: Minimal card with left emerald accent border. No rounded corners on left side (border-l-2). Tight padding. Blueprint precision.

tailwind.card: group border border-[#1e293b] border-l-2 border-l-[#10b981] bg-[#111621] p-5 transition-colors duration-200 hover:bg-[#171d2b] hover:border-l-[#34d399]
tailwind.overline: font-mono text-[11px] font-semibold uppercase tracking-[0.08em] text-[#10b981]
tailwind.title: mt-2 text-base font-semibold text-[#e2e8f0]
tailwind.link_row: mt-3 inline-flex items-center gap-1 font-mono text-[11px] font-medium text-[#10b981] opacity-0 transition-all duration-200 group-hover:opacity-100

navigation.layout: Fixed top bar, monochrome. Logo left with emerald dot indicator. Minimal links. Search right.

tailwind.nav: fixed top-0 z-50 w-full border-b border-[#1e293b] bg-[#0c0f14]/90 backdrop-blur-lg
tailwind.inner: mx-auto flex h-12 max-w-[1024px] items-center justify-between px-6
tailwind.logo: flex items-center gap-2 font-mono text-sm font-bold text-[#e2e8f0]

tailwind.section_label: px-4 py-1 font-mono text-[11px] font-semibold uppercase tracking-[0.08em] text-[#64748b]
tailwind.link: flex items-center gap-2 px-4 py-1.5 font-mono text-[13px] text-[#64748b] transition-colors hover:text-[#e2e8f0] hover:bg-[#1e293b30]

tailwind.base: inline-flex items-center rounded px-2 py-0.5 font-mono text-[11px] font-medium

badge.note: Badges use sharp corners (rounded, not rounded-full). Mono font always. Minimal.

code_block.layout: No chrome — just a bordered rectangle. Filename as monospace comment at top. Green accent for strings and keywords.

tailwind.header: flex items-center justify-between border-b border-[#1e293b] px-4 py-2
tailwind.line_number: inline-block w-6 text-right text-[#1e293b] select-none mr-4 font-mono

tailwind.trigger: flex h-8 w-48 items-center gap-2 rounded border border-[#1e293b] bg-[#111621] px-3 font-mono text-[11px] text-[#64748b] transition-colors hover:border-[#334155]
tailwind.kbd: ml-auto rounded border border-[#1e293b] px-1 py-0.5 font-mono text-[10px] text-[#64748b]

section_header.layout: Blueprint-style: thin horizontal rule, monospace overline label, then heading. No decorative elements.

tailwind.overline: font-mono text-[11px] font-semibold uppercase tracking-[0.12em] text-[#10b981] mb-2
tailwind.title: text-2xl font-semibold tracking-tight text-[#e2e8f0]
tailwind.subtitle: mt-2 max-w-lg text-[15px] text-[#94a3b8]

tailwind.title: font-mono text-[11px] font-semibold uppercase tracking-[0.08em] text-[#64748b] mb-3
tailwind.link: block py-1 font-mono text-[12px] text-[#64748b] transition-colors hover:text-[#e2e8f0]

animations.philosophy: Minimal. This concept favors instant response over theatrical entrance. Only the hero has a load animation. Everything else is CSS transitions only.

hero_entrance.description: Overline, title, subtitle, CTAs fade in with 100ms stagger. 300ms each. No vertical translation — pure opacity fade.

card_hover.description: 200ms background-color and border-color transition. No scale, no shadow, no glow. Crisp.

stat_counter.description: Numbers rendered static. No counting animation. The numbers ARE the animation — they are big and bold enough.

connector_pulse.description: The emerald dots on circuit-trace connector lines pulse subtly: opacity 0.5 to 1 over 2s infinite.

animations.reduced_motion: Connector pulse stops. Hero shows content immediately. All CSS transitions set to 0ms.

hero.mobile: text-4xl, left-aligned, stats stack vertically, no connector lines

cards.mobile: single column, 1px gap stacking creates continuous bordered list

accessibility.dot_grid: Pure CSS background-image, no DOM elements, no a11y impact
accessibility.monospace_readability: All mono text at 11px+ for readability. Never below 10px.
